39.content: horn installed front wheel gear serration DYNAMIXEL whereas bearing set installed back

40.content: Place thrust horn washer actuator inserting horn carefully align horn wheel gear serration aligning dots Once alignment properly done gently push center horn actuator Make sure horn washer place tighten bolt

41.content: need remove bearing set previous actuator reinstall new actuator bearing set also purchased separately As bearing set rotating freely therefore alignment required assembling DYNAMIXEL
